text: Yara pechane raye giyechila tara allah‌ra rasulera pascate tadera base thakate'i anandabodha karalo, ara tadera dhanadaulata o tadera janaprana diye allah‌ra pathe sangrama karate tara bimukha chila, ara tara balechila -- ''e'i garamera madhye beriyo na.’’ Tumi balo -- ''jahannamera aguna aro besi garama.’’ Yadi tara bujhate parato
